function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in academic research centers","Impact":"Risk of widespread infection among students, faculty, and staff","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and regular disinfection of facilities","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration and ventilation systems","People":"Students, faculty, staff","Owner":"University administration"},{"Description":"Limited ventilation and air circulation in research laboratories","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Install HEPA filtration systems and improve air circulation","Technologies":"HEPA filtration systems, HVAC enhancements","People":"Laboratory researchers, staff","Owner":"Facilities management"},{"Description":"International collaboration leading to cross-border disease transmission","Impact":"Risk of introducing and spreading new diseases across borders","Mitigation":"Monitor and regulate international travel, implement strict quarantine measures","Technologies":"Travel tracking systems, quarantine facilities","People":"International collaborators, travelers","Owner":"Health authorities"}]}
